The photograph in question is actually a: colorized and cropped version of the cover of a 2013 CD titled "Front to Back" by the musical group Wasnatch, which is described as a reggae-influenced music group from the Wasatch Mountains in Northern Utah.
The claim that the photograph is part of: marijuana ad is false and has no connection to marijuana or anti-drug advertising.
The caption accompanying the photograph: declaring "THIS ISN'T NORMAL. Unless you're addicted to Reefer Cigarettes. Then it happens all the time," is misleading and intended as a joke.
The Wasnatch group: s music can be found on platforms such as SoundCloud, Spotify, and YouTube, and their Facebook page provides further information about the band.
